survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Contactless Hotel Check-In Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from hotel guests who have used contactless check-in services to understand their satisfaction levels and identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied were you with the contactless check-in process at the hotel?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How satisfied were you with the contactless check-in process at the hotel?

questions.question_text: Which aspects of the contactless check-in process did you find most convenient? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option for additional feedback.

script.question_text: Which aspects of the contactless check-in process did you find most convenient? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What challenges did you face during the contactless check-in process?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture detailed feedback. Limit response length to 500 characters.

script.question_text: What challenges did you face during the contactless check-in process?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to use contactless check-in services again in the future?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How likely are you to use contactless check-in services again in the future?

questions.question_text: Do you have any suggestions for improving the contactless check-in experience?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture detailed feedback. Limit response length to 500 characters.

script.question_text: Do you have any suggestions for improving the contactless check-in experience?
